chunks.text:
1. Aon’s Cyber Advisory Services & the Current Threat Landscape

2. Cyber Considerations within the M&A space

3. An Evolving Cyber Insurance Market

Agenda:

 

09:00 - 09:30 - Breakfast / Networking

09:30 - 09:55 - Aon’s Cyber Advisory Services & the Current Threat Landscape

10:00 - 10:25 - Cyber Considerations within the M&A space

10:30 - 10:55 - An Evolving Cyber Insurance Market 

11:00 - 11:30 - Networking

The session will also include input from guests from the insurance industry, as well as cyber security and data privacy experts within the region. 

We look forward to an interesting and engaging session with you at 9AM on Wednesday, 6 November 2024.

 

To register, please reply to this e-mail confirming your attendance before Thursday 24th October 2024.

 

	

 <https://s686448682.t.en25.com/e/FooterImages/FooterImage1?elq=49e6d39899ef4ab29ae2fd51b9400ac6&siteid=686448682>
